mapper.select: SELECT pm.payment_num , pm.payment_name , pm.payment_status , mb.member_name , pm.payment_datetime , mv.movie_name_kr , t.theater_name , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT s.seat_name SEPARATOR ', ') AS seat_names , SUM(CASE WHEN sk.snack_name = '동백콤보' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dong_baek_combo_count , SUM(CASE WHEN sk.snack_name = '철쭉콤보' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS chul_juk_combo_count , pm.payment_card_name , pm.payment_total_price , count(o.order_num) AS headcount FROM PAYMENTS pm LEFT JOIN ORDERS o ON o.order_num = pm.order_num LEFT JOIN MEMBERS mb ON mb.member_id = o.member_id LEFT JOIN ORDER_TICKETS ot ON ot.order_num = o.order_num LEFT JOIN PLAYS pa ON pa.play_num = ot.play_num LEFT JOIN MOVIES mv ON mv.movie_num = pa.movie_num LEFT JOIN THEATERS t ON t.theater_num = pa.theater_num LEFT JOIN TICKET_TYPES tt ON tt.ticket_type_num = ot.ticket_type_num LEFT JOIN SEATS s ON s.seat_num = ot.seat_num LEFT JOIN ORDER_SNACKS os ON os.order_num = o.order_num LEFT JOIN SNACKS sk ON sk.snack_num = os.snack_num WHERE pm.payment_num = #{payment_num} GROUP BY pm.payment_num , mb.member_name , pm.payment_datetime , mv.movie_name_kr , t.theater_name

SELECT member_id , payment_num , payment_datetime , payment_total_price , payment_status FROM BUY_DETAIL WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND payment_datetime >= SUBDATE(now(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH) AND payment_datetime <= now() GROUP BY member_id , payment_num , payment_datetime , payment_total_price , payment_status ORDER BY payment_datetime DESC
LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}
SELECT movie_name_kr , ticket_type , count(ticket_type) AS 'ticket_quantity' FROM BUY_DETAIL WHERE payment_num = #{payment_num} GROUP BY movie_name_kr , ticket_type
SELECT IFNULL(sum(DISTINCT payment_total_price), 0) FROM BUY_DETAIL WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND payment_datetime >= CONCAT(YEAR(now()), '-01-01') AND payment_status = '결제완료'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENTS p JOIN ORDERS o ON o.order_num = p.order_num
WHERE o.member_id LIKE '%${paymentSearchKeyword}%'
